channel.title: Hello World on David Jankoski
channel.description: Recent content in Hello World on David Jankoski

item.title: thumbs up blogdown!
item.author: leledavid@gmail.com
item.description: Hello world post A lot of times I talk to friends and colleagues about the process of finding out new interesting material, project ideas, cool visualisations or just programming language tricks’n’tips in general and the majority of time the source of these things are people’s blogs. Additionally twitter and the #rstats hashtag are a major source as well but I find it is generally just a medium to actual blog posts.
